history.narrative: Law 19-38, the “Ward Redistricting Amendment Act of 2011”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-219, which was retained by the Council. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 7, 2011, and June 21, 2011, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 11, 2011, it was assigned Act No. 19-97 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-38 became effective on November 16, 2011.
